general: Use 'Manrope' for all headings and 'Inter' for body text.
Implement a 'Professional Light' theme. Do not use dark mode for the public landing pages.
Use the provided image URLs for specific sections. Do not use placeholders.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states (transform, color change).
landing_pages: A&O Landing: Use the 'hero_corporate' image with a subtle overlay.
ANMA Landing: Focus on the 'remote_agent' and 'logistics' images to show the dual nature (Sales + Ops).
Use Bento Grids for feature sections (e.g., 'Why Choose Us').
dashboards: Use a sidebar layout with a white background and subtle border.
Use 'Space Grotesk' for large metric numbers.
Keep the UI dense but legible. Use 'p-6' for card padding.
Use 'recharts' for data visualization (simple line/bar charts).
ecommerce: Product cards should be clean: Image top, Title, Price, 'Add to Cart' button.

universal_guidelines: Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Do not use gradients for text or backgrounds unless specified.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Never use transparent backgrounds for dropdowns or headers with content underneath.
